[Aura of Vengeance](/Feats.aspx?ID=252) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 114 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
[exalt](/Classes.aspx?ID=4); [Vengeful Oath](/Feats.aspx?ID=222)

</column>

---

When you call upon others to take retribution, you also guide their aim. When you use Retributive Strike, your allies who make Strikes take only a –2 penalty, instead of a –5 penalty.
